text: Hagakure (Hidden by the Leaves) is a Japanese practical guide for samurai with commentaries by Yamamoto Tsunetomo. The book contains views on bushido, the warrior code of the samurai. Bushido is considered The Way of Dying. It means samurai is ready to death at any time for honor. == Related pages == * Bushido Category:Samurai Category:Japanese literature
title: Hagakure
